nml_option.name: config_deep_convection_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels in the deep convection case. Typical value is 50-100.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer number greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_deep_convection_random_perturbation_strength
nml_option.description: strength of perturbation in layer 1 to initiate convection

nml_option.name: config_deep_convection_temperature_stratification
nml_option.description: Initial stratification in C/m, default is unstratified

nml_option.name: config_deep_convection_surface_cooling_strength
nml_option.description: constant cooling rate in W/m^2, will place in latentHeatFlux

nml_option.name: config_deep_convection_smooth_passes
nml_option.description: number of smoothing passes of layer 1 temperature
